TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CustomTypeDescriptor extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class CustomTypeDescriptor Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供 接口的简单默认实现。

span.span: Provides a simple default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如、类依赖于类型的父对象构造过程中提供。Like , the class relies on a parent object of type supplied during construction. 这允许派生自的类有选择地重写方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数等效于调用的其他构造函数的参数与`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter that is `null`. 所有方法创建与此构造函数将返回默认值。All methods of a created with this constructor will return default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor parent) cil managed

param.name: parent
param.span: 父级自定义类型说明符。

span.span: The parent custom type descriptor.

summary.span: 使用父级自定义类型说明符初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent custom type descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`参数是`null`，所有方法将返回默认值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否则为所有方法会将对方法的委托`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 大多数方法返回`null`默认情况下。Most methods return `null` by default. 下表显示不会返回的方法的返回值`null`默认情况下。The following table shows the return values for the methods that do not return `null` by default. |方法Method|默认返回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||空的属性集合 ()。An empty attribute collection ().| ||默认值实例。The default instance.| ||空的事件集合 ()。An empty events collection ().| ||空的属性集合 ()。An empty property collection ().|
